original_title: Take Me Home: The John Denver Story
overview: A small-screen adaptation of Denverâ€™s biography focuses on how Denver seemingly lived for one thing only: the approval of his Air Force pilot father. Even if this telepic had stuck to the facts, it could have created a far warmer portrait of a man whose simple and uplifting songs became his passport to the world.
title: Take Me Home: The John Denver Story
